title: Source Passive Candidates
description: A recruiter is sourcing passive candidates for a hard-to-fill 'Cybersecurity Architect' role using LinkedIn Recruiter.

tasks.description: Build a Boolean search string to identify candidates with the required skills and experience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter creates an effective search string (e.g., '"cybersecurity architect" AND (AWS OR Azure) AND CISSP').

tasks.description: Execute the search on a professional networking site and review the profiles of the top results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter identifies a list of 20 promising candidates.

tasks.description: Send personalized outreach messages to the top candidates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter sends InMail messages to the candidates, introducing the role and company.
